description:
Jizou Ami is a second year student that requested help from the http://anidb.net/ch20883 [Otogi Bank], after which she went on a double date with http://anidb.net/ch16161 [Ryouko] and http://anidb.net/ch16163 [Ryoushi]. Afterwards, she occasionally makes appearances.
She is based on the Jizou from the Japanese tale Kasa Jizou.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Jizou Ami
